item.title: A lifestyle that supports a knowledge-based career
item.description: When it comes to technical careers which revolve around knowledge and critical thinking, most will consider things like education, courses and experience to be the only methods for improvement. But this misses a fundamental fact about work/life balance, in that it works both ways. Managing our diet, stress, brain health and other factors that affect critical thinking can have a huge impact on our ability to be the very best in our careers.
